title: Where is the Call Screen setting in Pixel 3a Android 11?
content:
Where is the Call Screen setting in Pixel 3a Android 11? I have looked everywhere. When I search settings for "call screen" or "call screening", the results are empty. I know that Android 11 broke (or vanished) call screening for Pixel users. It broke it for me, didn't vanish it. So when a call comes in, I do have the Screen option, but it no longer works right. The fix is supposedly to disable it, reboot phone, enable it again.

But how can I disable it if I cannot find the setting? Other posts have said that Call Screen is near the bottom of the main Settings screen. NOT SO for Pixel 3a in Android 11.

Please help.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
